dataArray.name: Rederly
dataArray.title: Principal Software Engineer & Head of Software, Full Stack
bullets: **Responsibilities:** Led and contributed to a team that designed and built an educational technology platform from the ground up. This platform allowed professors to organize and leverage content from their current WebWork servers.
**Team**: 2 full-time software engineers (including myself), 1 part-time data engineer, and the CEO performing QA on top of business responsibilities
**Usage:** Scaled the platform to 150+ professors and 4,500+ students across 25+ institutions during our paid beta launch
**Accomplishments - Exams:** Administered 10,000+ exams to students from 500+ exam definitions.
**Accomplishments - Grades:** Tracked 600,000+ grades which contained over 2 million attempts.

**Design:** Application was broken up into an array of dockerized microservices. Some of those microservices were run on AWS ECS and had redundancy and auto scaling. This design increased reliability as well as making it easier to test and do partial deployments. It also allowed for experimentation into other frameworks due to the lower responsibility of each service.
**Frameworks:** Express, React, Sequelize, Prisma, Fastify, Waitress (Python)

dataArray.name: Intelligent Product Solutions
dataArray.title: Software Engineer
bullets: **Responsibilities:** Supported 15+ clients on roughly 20 different projects to make their innovations come to life. Designed and built applications on a wide range of technologies including web applications, mobile applications and applications on embedded devices. Set up servers on AWS or Azure running linux to run these applications, or in one case to migrate internal Atlassian servers to.
**Languages:** Javascript, Java, C#, Swift, Objective C, HTML, CSS, C++, C, Lua
**Frameworks:** Express, React, Sequelize, .NET MVC, Apache Tomcat, GStreamer, Meteor
**Databases:** PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server, Realm, Mongo, RethinkDB
**Recruitment:** Organized recruitment including documenting processes, documenting questions, orchestrating candidate process

dataArray.name: St. Joseph's College
bullets: **Volunteer Teacher's Assistant**: Spent 3 semesters contributing to a Mobile Applications course. Helped students to learn and understand Android, supported code debugging, and coached them on interviewing skills by performing mock interviews.
**Mobile Code Camp Apps Counselor (1 week):** Brainstormed with participants (children) about new mobile apps ideas, and help them develop a simple one of their own.
**Minecraft Code Camp Counselor (1 week):** Taught participants (children) some basic Java skills so they were able to create their own item in Minecraft..
